FuncDef:
The ripng input command enables the specified interface to receive RIPng packets.
The undo ripng input command disables the specified interface from receiving RIPng packets. The ripng input command enables the specified interface to receive RIPng packets. The undo ripng input command disables the specified interface from receiving RIPng packets. By default, interfaces can receive RIPng packets.
